title: Prismacolor Premier Colored Pencils, Soft Core, Botanical Garden Set, 12 Count
description: Breathe brilliant, artist-quality color into exotic garden scenes with the Prismacolor Premier botanical garden colored Pencil set. Your coloring Pencil set features 12 colored pencils that were hand selected to bring the vividly lush flowers and trees of botanical Gardens to life. The thick, creamy cores deliver an effortlessly smooth color laydown that allows you to blend and shade like a Pro. Each art Pencil is also packed with richly saturated pigments for intensely colorful designs. That means, whether you’re a professional artist or budding amateur, your artistic vision will be perfectly captured.
